WorkItem.ClosedComment: Fixed, your aura (if you have the talent) and the Buff one cannot overlap anymore. The Buff will be checkable but it won't do anything until you take the talent point out because you are putting it up yourself
WorkItem.Description: The DPS does not change when ticking Trueshot aura under Buffs. Tested on a MM spec'd Hunter. No change when adding the Trueshot buff to pet either.
WorkItem.Summary: [Hunter] Adding Trueshot Aura has no difference to DPS

Comments.Message: I was looking at the code. Maybe this behaviour is to be expected. If I understand the code correctly it differs between the "talent" based Trueshot aura, and the buff one.

Indeed it seems to function in the way that the Trueshot Aura on the buff tab is to be regarded as "Some other hunter than you".

Suggestion is to put some text on the buff tab next to the Trueshot buff explaining this. Like "Not you." or something similar.

This issue is thereby not a bug, more of an enhancement request.
